request.description: Get the resource by Id. Probably will return an image.

In the form, `file` needs to be sent with an image(.jpg format) or a text(.txt format).

Return value:

``` json
{
    "url": "http://localhost:5001/query/resource/8" // url to the resource
}

```

Delete a resource by Id

Return value:

``` json
{
    "status": "ok"
}

```
